name: Dominique Taylor
text:
My Wedding dress was to little and when I tell you the owner got my dress together “ Yess “
I looked amazing thank you so much!

name: Emma Latham
text:
I took a dress in to get the zipper fixed and the seamstress told me flat out that there was nothing she could do and that the dress was too tight. She didn’t offer to take it out (even though there was extra material to work with) and just told me to drink a bunch of water and eat healthier... even though I’m a size 2.

Overall, this business doesn’t deserve to tout their namesake of “miracle work”.
Plus there are loose needles all over the floor so keep your shoes on.

name: Diane Chaney was big v CV v
text: Excellent job I  will be using her services again.

name: Emily Griner
text: I took my dress in to have it hemmed. I tried it on for Gwen and she pinned up the hem and even complimented how “perfect” the dress was. So no faults. When I picked my dress up, the side seam was opened. There were no faults when I dropped it off, but this major flaw when I picked it up. Gwen had me pay an EXTRA fee to get the dress finished by Wednesday instead of Thursday and they closed before I was able to take it back to be fixed. I had to leave town for my event so wasn’t able to take it back in, nor would I have been comfortable leaving it with them again. When I called to let then know about the situation, she assured me that there was NO WAY that is was their fault and that I must have done something wrong. Did not offer an apology of any sort. This is all after paying $80 for a hem on this $300 designer dress. Overall so disappointed with how the situation was handled.

name: Hailey Houson
text: Brought my beaded wedding dress in to be tailored. Gwen did an amazing job and was able to alter it without cutting and resewing the dress (which would have been difficult and more expensive). My husband also brought in his suit which was custom made online but had a strange fit. When they were done his suit fit him perfectly. Gwen and the staff were so friendly and helpful throughout the whole process.

name: Sydney Seals
text: Mrs. Gwen is a DREAM to work with!! She practically re-made my wedding gown to PERFECTLY meet my expectations! She is a wonderful, genuine person who made the overall experience enjoyable & stress free! Reasonably priced, as well! Would definitely recommend her to anyone needing alterations done

name: EB Kuhn
text: I've worked with Gwen for tailoring three bridesmaids dresses. She and the whole staff at Miracle Works are fantastic. Reasonable prices, reliable product, excellent service.  I've been so please with her work, I'm having her tailor my wedding dress! (Will post another review about her wedding gown work).

name: Michael Burke
text: This place is no joke. I asked how long it would take to get my pants done and she said a week, but put ASAP on my ticket. They had them done in 4 days and my pants turned out absolutely perfect. I will be going back for anything an everything with them. 100 percent recommend this place.

name: Kelly McRae
text: Just went to get my son's pants hemmed and it was super fast even though we were there right at closing! The people there are so warm and inviting and we will definitely be doing more business with them!! I Highly recommend Miracle Work Alterations!! Excellent work and even better customer service!!

name: Lindsey Gilbert
text: I quickly needed a chiffon bridesmaids dress altered and the staff at Miracle Work not only accommodated, but did absolutely flawless work. The price was very comparable, and I was more than happy to pay it considering it was a rush order and the quality of work done. Would absolutely recommend!

name: Andrew Nail
text:
Miracle Works Alterations is one of the best businesses I have ever had the pleasure of working with. I have had 20+ items (suits, blazers, and slacks) tailored by Miracle Works and could not be happier. They will make an off-the-rack suit look like it was made to measure.

In addition to the the exceptional quality of the work, the customer service is outstanding. Ms. Gwenlyn, Cornelius, and Clarissa (family business) have always be extremely friendly and accommodating. The work is competed in a timely manner and for a fair price.

I would recommenced Miracle Works to anyone, and I will never use anyone else.

name: Nichol Welty
text: Got my bride's maids dress altered here. I had to order the dress while I was out of the country and it ended up being at least 2 sizes too big. Miracle Work was so attentive to what I wanted and so precise it was perfect. They were understanding of my short timetable and the dress was flawless- no second alteration needed.

name: Amanda DeBrot
text: Had my bridesmaid dress altered here. Fabulous experience! Incredibly nice women. Price is perfect. Dress turned out perfect. Will definitely be using them again soon!

name: Deona Flowers
text: Great pricing and perfect timing. The work is amazing!! Professional and friendly! 38 years of combined experience.

name: Elyse Dengler
text:
Pros: The work was done quickly and they called to let me know when it was ready.  They will stay late for a few minutes if you let them know you are on your way.
Cons: They did not ask or listen to what I wanted. She was talking to her friend the whole time she was pinning my dress.  The hem on my dress is obviously uneven in one area, it is too short, and I had pads sewn in that will have to be redone somewhere else. They made me change in their sewing room, which does not have a door or curtain.

name: Lauren Meaux
text: It cost me $88 just to get a dress hemmed, which was almost as much as the dress itself! They did a good job, but I've never seen prices that high and I have gotten many dresses hemmed.

name: Harold Brownlee
text: Very good business and great owner ship

name: Maria U
text:
Very polite! Good prices and they are very honest about how much everything will be.
I found my go to place for any alterations. Thank you!

name: Tonicia Williamson-Paige
text: Very sweet and gets the job done on dresses.

name: Janica Davis
text: I needed a queen sized comforter so I took her two twin sized comforter and she sewed them together to get what I wanted!!

name: Seth Byram
text: Always great work.  Timely and professional.  Couldn't ask for better service.

name: Ashley McLaughlin
text: Gwen does a fabulous job on all kinds of clothing!! And...she gets it done in a timely manner.

name: Verneshia Williams
text: Mrs. Gwen does excellent work and she is always willing to work with your schedule. The prices are very affordable!!!

name: kristie self
text: Miss. Gwen is incredible. I'll never do to anyone else!

name: Whitney Craig
text: Mrs. Gwen and Mrs. Clarissa are the best in town!

name: M Juergensen
text: I drive 45 mins each way because they are that good, that lovely, and that worth it.

name: Gwenlyn Brownlee
text: 38 Years doing what we do to make you feel good in your clothes

text: Great work fast.

name: Brittany Brashaw
text: I just got my dress back from Lori and she did an amazing job. Lori is a very kind and fair person and the work she does is simply beautiful. I am a very busy person and Lori worked around my schedule to get the job done quickly. Could not be more happy!

name: Philip Dayley
text: Very quick and friendly service! I took her my Army Officer's uniforms for fitting and she did an amazing job! I highly recommend her!

name: Tamara Mizell
text: Mrs. Lori has always taken such good care of my alterations, pays great attention to detail, her work is quality and in timely fashion!!

name: Anna C Dewberry
text: Got a bridesmaids dress hemmed that was way too long. It was ready in about two weeks and fit perfectly. Be sure to have plenty of cash or a check with you as she does not take cards.

name: Dan Burgess
text: Sewed my patches on my leather vest.   Great job!   Highly recommend!!

name: Deb in Alabama
text:
I was extremely & pleasantly surprised by Angel Alterations, as well as the price for what she did.  Extremely reasonable!  I originally stopped at another shop that I'd never been to before (apologize, as I forget the name, but it's on Madison Blvd. - might be Kay's Cleaners-?) ...anyway, I was about to go out-of-state for a funeral in TX.  I only had 1 pair of pants that I could wear, but the legs needed a little bit of hemming.  I was desperate & needed to save money, so I didn't want to buy new ones.

Long story short - the 1st stop said they send out their alterations, so no one at that location could do them.  However, the lady there called over to Angel's Alterations (where they send to) to find out if they could do an on-the-spot hem & was told YES!

So I immediately drove over to Angel's Alterations (not far at all from other location) and I met Ms. Gloria (aka NAN) who owns the shop.  She is a very-very kind lady, and has such a beautiful little alteration shop with lots of flowers and the cutest little 13-yr-old tiny dog named Coco (sp-?).

So Ms. Gloria had me try on my pants right then, asked where I needed hemmed & said she would do right away.  She not only did it in less than 10 minutes, but she did it very professionally & for more than a reasonable price for doing it on-the-spot!  I was so very-very thankful!

She is a very kind Christian lady, and I will definitely be back, as well as recommend her to ANYONE that needs anything hemmed!

NOTE:  If you do go to her, be sure to either have CASH or CHECKBOOK, as she does NOT take credit cards!

Blessings to each!

name: William Matthews
text: Angel's does GREAT ALTERATIONS!!! The lady there knows how to do good work. She takes pride in her work! Her prices are very reasonable. She has the alterations done when she says they'll be done.  Anytime O need alterations from now on, I will go to Angel's!!!!!!!

name: Laura Vaughn
text: Amazing experience!! Fast and quality work, and she’s so very sweet and friendly!!

name: Sam Alexander

text: I dropped off robes on February 5th to have them monogrammed for a wedding on March 2nd. She never called me in the 10 day span to tell me there was an issue! I ordered another robe and tried to take it to her on February 25th and 26th but the shop was closed. Dropped it off on February 27th and reminded Christine that these robes were needed for March 2nd; she assured me that I could pick them up on March 1st. On March 1st, Christine had not done the work on any of the robes that I gave her. She failed to call me ahead of time so that I could have time to find someone else to do the work! She told me she didn't have my number, but it was on the order form that was filled out on February 5th. I DO NOT recommend using this company! VERY UNPROFESSIONAL.

name: Chayse Fuller
text:
I stopped by here because I was very short on time and my usual spot was too far away so I stopped here. I had heard this place was expensive, but I was in a hurry and was willing to pay the extra dollar or so (I thought) per item. When I dropped all of my clothes off I was a little curious why they didn’t want me to pay upfront or even give me a ticket with an amount on it, but it was one less thing to do and at the moment and I was happy to be in and out quickly. All is well.
Fast forward two days to when I go to pick up my clothes and the tell me the total.....$82.52 for 12 shirts and 7 pairs of pants. No silk, fur or leather just cotton dress shirts and pants.
$3.75 per shirt and $7.00 per pant.
Thank god I brought in two weeks worth of work clothes and got my 6th shirt and 6th pair of pants for a penny! Lucky me!
I 100% understand and support paying a premium price for premium quality and/or service. The employees were very friendly and they offer next day pickup depending on what time you drop your clothes off. Unfortunately, next day pick up has been standard at every dry cleaners I have ever used and, for the most part, so has friendly employees. I honestly can’t see how anyone who has been there and had to pay for their services would go back.
In summary: don’t go here. Literally, go anywhere else that is open and near you and save 40-50%.

text: I have been using Worth Cleaners for several years and continue to be impressed with their quality, service and friendly staff. name: Kimberly Lewis
text:
I went to this location on November 7th to see of they would clean an area rug. The lady that checked me in looked at the rug, consulted with another worker that was there at the time, gave me a ticket, and told me that the rug would be ready around the same time the following week. I called on November 14th to check the status of the rug. I was told "Yes, the rug is ready, but we couldn't clean it." I asked her why did anyone not call me to let me know that it could not be cleaned? Basically all I got was an "I don't know" and some other pathetic excuse. I immediately proceeded to pick up my uncleaned rug that has just been sitting on a table for an entire week.
For the entire life of me, I do not understand why something as simple as a phone call did not happen. As soon as they saw that they could not accommodate, all they had to do was call and say, "We apologize for the inconvenience, but we cannot clean your rug." I would have happily returned to pick up my rug and found another company to clean it. I am pretty sure that someone knew that Friday morning after I dropped off, that they would not be able to clean my rug. But NO, the rug just sat there until I called to check on it.  A simple phone call. Communication, communication, communication. Inconsideration and/or laziness. But regardless, there was absolutely no reason why I was not contacted. This was my first and most definitely my last visit.

name: Tony Drake
text: The folks at Worth Cleaners on Vaughn Road are like family.  They hustle to get me in and out as quickly as possible since I come in on my way to work. They are always pleasant and always happy to see me.  The clothes are always clean and starched just like I like them.  I couldn't ask for better service.

text: By far the best dry cleaners in Montgomery! I have had items ruined at some of the other dry cleaners in town and charged an arm and a leg by the others. I like that Worth Cleaners posts their prices on their website so I know how much everything's going to cost before I go. Plus their staff is super friendly. I would definitely recommend Worth Cleaners.

name: Cecilia Ike
text: If you do not care about your clothes and want them ruined, you have come to the right place. I recently purchased 2 pretty gowns for my daughters, they wore it to one family occasion before we sent it to worth cleaners. They tore one and used their dryer to shrink the organza fabric overlay of the other one. They returned the clothes without mentioning anything about the damage(very fraudulent people) and when I asked them about it, they stated that they only followed the instructions on the care label, that I needed to go back to the store where I bought it (belk, 21 days ago) and complain to the manufacturer about the wrong care label. Seriously......for even the torn outfit? I don't understand why these scammers are still in business. I left the 2 gowns with them and they are yet to contact me 3 weeks later. There are so many credible laundry services out there, do not make my mistake!!

resp.text: Dizzy, we are very sorry to hear about your experience. We strive to give every customer that walks through the door the best possible cleaning service and we are sorry that you feel that wasn't the case. Please reach out if you would like to discuss this matter any further. Thank you, Worth Cleaners.

During the fitting, the seamstresses pinned, measured and marked the dress in less than 10 minutes. And when I got the dress back and tried it on, the hem was absolutely perfect in length.
I will absolutely use this service for any future needs and recommend it to anyone.

text: I needed a new suit altered and I have used Tangs in Montgomery many times in the past. I expected the same quality from the prattville location however I was very disappointed. The problem started when I returned to pick up my suit. The alterations were not right and the suit would not fit at all. I asked what could be done to fix it and I was told they would not correct the mistake. When I asked why they could not fix it I was told they do not make mistakes so there would be nothing to fix. I asked if we had any type of options since I had just paid 600.00 for the suit and 80 for alterations. I was told to just buy another suit. I called  the Pepper Tree tangs and spoke to the owner she asked me to bring it over and stayed late to meet me. With in a couple of days she had my suit fixed. So Tangs in Montgomery 5 stars Tangs in Prattville 1 star, won't use them again and I hate that I would really like to use a local shop.

name: Doug Zeiger
text: Our wedding was planned for May 2nd. Covid-19 became the reality and there was disaster after disaster. We cancelled, replanned, downsized, and resized to accommodate the changing world around us. At the start, I had expert advice and help from Ben who fashioned two outfits for the preceding parties. The styling, the fit, and the attention to detail was superb. If you like things done right, go to Shaia's. But the story continues, for the actual wedding day we had a tuxedo picked out that was being made in Italy. The factory had to shut down due to the virus and in the few weeks leading up to the wedding, I was facing quite the dilemma. Ben called me for a special appointment to come in and see what could be done from what was on hand at the store. Ben and Ken went far beyond the extra mile to make sure I was not only clothed for my wedding, but the tuxedo was classy, comfortable, and contained the right amount of original. I cannot recommend Shaia's any higher. There were even a few other minor disasters with needing a haircut and my brides' dress needing last minute alterations that we took to Ken because he just got things done. This is where you can truly see Ken's kindness. He helped us in a huge way during our time of need. Shaia's is a five star store from every angle thanks to a helpful, accommodating, and knowledgeable staff.

resp.text: Thanks Doug for your sincere review. Congratulations to you and your wife, we can't wait to see the photos.

text: My husband has only recently been interested in "nice clothes." He's known Ken Shaia for years but we've not shopped there regularly. I decided to take him there for his 50th birthday a couple of years ago. Not only did we have a great time, we got so many timeless pieces that my husband loves. I continue to shop there and build his wardrobe which is the beauty of shopping at Shaia's: nothing trendy; all classic, tailored pieces that make him feel like a million bucks. We can call Shaia's, describe an upcoming event, and they'll have the perfect ensemble put together when we get there or, better yet, something that will go perfectly with the pieces we've already bought. A great place!

name: George
text:
WOW! Absolutely positively the best shopping experience I have ever had. I have an athletic build and finding clothes that fit my physique is impossible. Well, until I met Greg Flowers. He was my consultant, and he gave me the most knowledgable, helpful & educational journey about properly fitting clothes, what a tailor can and cannot do, and how to layer elements together into a cohesive personal style that is all your own. Greg has in-depth knowledge of all the products in the store, how they fit, which brands flatter certain body types, how to build a cohesive wardrobe and what will look good on you in a way that fits your personal style. The atmosphere at the store is relaxing and makes shopping feel like you are strolling around at home chatting with very knowledge and suave friends.

After one visit I am a full convert. If you have trouble finding clothes that not only fit but also complement your very hard-earned physique, then do yourself a favor and go see Greg.

name: Josh Davis
text: I wish there was a half a star rating. Our police department used state grant money to buy $600 worth of equipment. Six months after the full payment, we called to find out where our gear was and was told it was on back order. Two more months went by and we call, only to be told they are not sure what's going on with the order. Later that week, we called and were told they had to order the equipment from a different vendor. Now 14 months later, we cannot get anyone to answer to get our money back. Worthless crooks and I would not advise anyone doing business here.

text: We use Duty Gear for all our work apparel. They even make custom patches! Friendly staff and great prices on monogramming

name: tim deen
text: On 4/6/17 I ordered three uniform shirts and was told they would be in in two weeks. After two weeks I call back and was told they were on back order. This went on every week until on 5/19/17, I was told they were in and were on the seamstress' table to have stripes and patches sewn on first thing Monday morning. I arrive Monday afternoon to pick up my shirts, only to be told that they would not be in until the next day. I get a little hot and just told the cashier to refund my money and I'll order from Amazon. When I asked to talk to the manager, the cashier informs me that he was the person who just ran to the back of the store. NO CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!! I understand that items will be back ordered, but it is an entirely different issue to be lied to and to waste your gas to find out that the management lied to you. I will never set foot in this place again and I will notify my department and every other officer that I know, what a poor quality business that this is. Ordered from Amazon and they will be in on 5/26/17. Should have started there first.

resp.text: We certainly regret the miscommunication that occurred yesterday while Mr Deen was here. As he states he was informed late last week that his shirts were here and waiting for our seamstress to apply the patches he had provided. That was indeed the case, but when she came to these shirts, there was some confusion as to which patches were to be applied. As a result, the shirts were not complete when the customer arrived. I have personally spoken with this customer and explained that there was a misunderstanding that resulted in his impression that the shirts were not here and that he had been misled. My offer to him was and is to do whatever I can to make this up to him, including immediately applying these patches at no cost to the shirts he is purchasing online. Understandably, he is quite upset, but my offer will stand and I sincerely hope that given time, he will allow me to rectify this issue and regain his trust as a customer.

name: Jennifer
text: Evanna’s is the best bridal boutique! The ladies there are so sweet and helped me find my dream wedding dress!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Jennifer! We’ve enjoyed working with you and we’re more than happy to be able to help you find The Dream Dress! You will be a Gorgeous Bride on your Big Day and we are thrilled to be a tiny part of it!

name: Tricia Buzzelli
text: Incredible service. Attentive and really intelligent staff who make sure everything is correct for your special day. My friend received her wedding dress from out of town and it needed a lot of work in order to make it fit, Evanna took special care and attention to detail on order to alter the dress perfectly. She even made some quick alterations while we were there in order to make sure the dress was comfortable. The staff was so cheerful and polite and made sure we had impeccable service. It also looks like they have a great selection of dresses and even some that are handmade and one of a kind. I would recommend this shop to any and all of my closest friends.

resp.text: Thank you so much Tricia! We truly had a blast with both of you. You are so much fun to work with & we appreciate you choosing Evanna's Bridal.

name: Nicole Buziak
text: This boutique is absolutely spectacular! The women who own it are super nice, hard working, and you can tell that they love what they do! They're friendly and make the entire experience fun and positive! There's so many gorgeous options and styles to choose from so you can't go wrong! I would recommend them to any family member or friend. When I get engaged, they'll be the people I go to. Can't recommend enough!

resp.text: Thank you Nicole! Your kind feedback is very much appreciated.

name: Cerra Little
text: This is the best place in the Tuscaloosa area to buy a wedding dress! The ladies were so friendly, honest, helpful, and informative. I have been to several wedding dress stores and this was by FAR the best experience I had! I wish I could do it over and over again with them.

resp.text: Thank you Cerra! We had the best time with you as well, as you are impossible not to adore. We are honored to call ourselves a tiny part of your Big Day.

name: Helene Brock
text: This is the place to get a dress! They are very sweet and great at helping you pick the perfect dress. Very professional and have beautiful dresses!

resp.text: Thank you Helene! We appreciate you chose our boutique as your wedding dress shopping destination and we are honored to call you one of Evanna’s Brides.

name: Anica Marx
text: My shopping experience at Evanna's bridal was amazing! Eva and Anna are the best - very welcoming and friendly! They helped me find the dress of my dreams. They offer beautiful, high-quality wedding dresses in a very pretty store. The alterations of my wedding dress worked out perfectly, as well as those of my fiancé's wedding suit. Highly recommend this place!

resp.text: Anica, we can't thank you enough for your kind feedback! We really appreciate you choosing Evanna's Bridal and we are honored to call ourselves a tiny part of your Big Day.

name: Monica Hill
text:
Took my daughter in search for the perfect dress.  We didn't have an appointment so I wasn't expecting much. We walked into the boutique, Anna greeted us with a warm smile and a "Good morning". From that moment forward it was like a fairytale experience! The appointment she had scheduled happened to reschedule, it was a sign in my eyes that this was definitely where we were suppose to be! Both Eva & Anna were kind and inviting! I'm so glad I decided to stop here!
Thank you both for a great experience!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind feedback Monica. Courtney sure made a Beautiful Bride and we are absolutely honored you Ladies chose Evanna's Bridal to be your wedding dress shopping destination.

name: Morgan Rotch
text: These women are amazing! So hard working and they have a beautiful selection!

name: Lauren Mosley
text: Can’t say enough about the ladies at Evanna’s! I had my dress altered here and I couldn’t be more pleased with the experience! They do incredible work!

name: Megan Moore
text: Evanna’s bridal boutique altered my sample sale gown. They could not have done a better job!! The gown was ripped in the back, dingy, and needed major alterations. When we picked up the gown, it fit perfectly and looked brand new! They also placed my late MIL’s veil on a new comb for me. I could not be more pleased with their work! Would highly recommend.

resp.text: Megan, We're so happy we could help! We really appreciate your kind feedback & we are honored you chose Evanna's Bridal alteration services.

text: These ladies helped me find my perfect dress! They were so sweet & helpful. They’re new to town, but SO worth it. Thank You!!

text: Eva and Anna are both amazing! They did an incredible job helping me find a dress that made me feel beautiful, and made it even better after alterations. name: A Google User
text: ONLY reason I gave 1 star is because I couldn't give her a big fat 0! She RUINED my daughter's wedding dress! We are having to take it somewhere else to attempt to fix the mess she made and even they say it may be impossible to fix. Being the tender heart my daughter is she paid her even though she's devastated. I personally think this lady should pay for the damage she made to this dress. It's really IS that bad.

name: Patrick Tidwell
text: Ms. June did a great job on alterations for my wife’s wedding dress

name: William borntrager
text: JUNS is great! I take all of my scrubs and suits here. She did an amazing job on my Mardi Gras tux and is super fast!

name: Donita Cox
text: Christina is a very good seamstress. She always calls to let you know that your garment is ready and it is done in a timely and professional matter. She doesn’t over charge for her service. She is my go to lady when I need something fixed or custom made.

name: Max Jay Weston
text: Owner is very personable and conscious. Alterations were done before time promised and work was excellent.

name: Heather Jackson
text: This is our go to seamstress in Foley! She has great turn around time, extremely fair prices and her work is amazing. I have no idea why there are so many negative reviews! We’ve had a great experience for the 2+ years we’ve used her. She has altered cheer uniforms, regular clothing and formals for us.

name: Debra Desverreaux
text: Great work! I have had her do formals, jeans, dresses. She is amazing

name: Sarah Stack
text: I dropped my wedding gown off to Christine a month before my wedding. She planned to "let out 3 inches" of the waistline. I called her shop to check the status of my gown the day I was told it would be finished and she implied to me that she hadn't even started altering it yet. She asked for 3 more days (making it 10 days before my wedding day). 3 days later I went to try on my dress and I could not even remotely zip up the entire top half of my dress ( which was not the case when dropped it off to her..I could not comfortably zip it up and maybe had 1" that I couldn't zip). I believe she took it in 3" instead of letting it out. After informing me there was no fabric left to let it back out, she then proceeded to embarrass me in front of other people in her shop. She asked if I could find better undergarments to "suck all of that in". When I replied that apart from removing a rib or two this is as good as it gets for me, she said "honey...there is more than just ribs going on here." She said "I can't think of anything to fix this. If I do, I will call you in the next two days." I did everything I could to leave as fast as possible so I could get in my car and cry. Thank goodness for Dillard's having formals and I found a decent replacement the next day (9 days before my wedding). Regardless of her skills as a seamstress on other projects, I will not recommend or return to Christine.

name: Debbie Desverreaux
text: I have had many things altered by her and have been happy with everything she has done. I recommend her !!!!!!!!!!

name: Christy Davis
text: Very helpful and quick turn around time!

name: John Westendorf
text: This lady is great and full of personality.  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

name: Brxken Hexrt
text: I had done business here before so I went there in July for a September wedding it's August 22 just got suit back first time it was supposed to be ready she had not started it so we waited again when we went to pick it up the plate on left side of pants was folded over and sewn to the part that covers zipper. Instead of addressing the error she wanted to argue with me very rude in front of other customers that came in and my kids trying to make me look like I was the problem only to admit she did so it when my husband took the pants off and i began examining the alterations and threads hanging that she didn't trim off which matched exactly the threads used to sew the plate to the zipper cover even after admitting this wanted to insist I was rude I'm lije no ma'am I kept trying to ask you about this and told you it wasn't like that before she tried to say someone else must have done that I said no ma'am it's never been altered before coming here. The alteration was mainly to take in the seat and well needless to say it wasn't done right she still charged me full price and he can't wear this suit without further alterations. I'll never go back there she's ugly person has no idea about alterations on a suit.

name: Alabama Coast
text: Christine is a lifesaver. Embarrassed by having to bring my "consignment store" gown in at the last minute, she smiled and said "I will take care of you!". What a blessing!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for taking the time to leave your feedback. We value your business.

name: Melissa F
text:
I needed a bridesmaid dress taken out a little and hemmed, when I arrived she rudely told me to put the dress on so she can see what we have to work with, when I came out of the dressing room she was grabbing at the sides of the dress and acting like it was the most stressful task she had ever encountered. She kept saying "oh, I can't do ANYTHING with this" and "Can you lose any weight before the wedding?" By the time I left her establishment, I was in tears... As I was leaving she looked at me with pitty and told me she "will pray for me".  No thank you, I don't need your "prayers", I need my dress fixed.
Two good things did come from this awful experience- First- I did find an amazing friend that was able to corset the back of my dress and make me feel wonderful in it. And second... I learned how to sew so I could fix my own clothes without ridicule.
I do NOT recommend this woman... Not after the way she made me feel about gaining a few pounds.

name: matsi hound
text: This woman's carelessness resulted in ruining the only wedding that I will ever have. She is extremely unorganized. She took my wedding dress home to work on (says she doesn't work on formals in her shop) and then put it in her unlocked car overnight and it WAS STOLEN TWO DAYS BEFORE MY WEDDING!!!! Or so she says. I think she just messed up on it or procrastinated and didn't do her job so she just made a phony report and cashed in on her business insurance. Either way, no I will never be back and if you do business with her, I pray that she does not shatter your dreams like she did mine.

name: Denise Wood
text: Had an expensive, sleeveless blouse taken up in the shoulders.Tried it on at  Christine's where she pinned it.When I got it back she took it up twice as much as pinned and it was not wearable.My arms could not move in it.

name: Angela Wingard
text: Holy crud....she is so unprofessional, very rude...
